about_the_game:
About


Unease is a 1 to 4 players survival horror game presenting an array of episodes with innovative mechanics and different settings. With its unique blend of historical settings and innovative mechanics, Unease delivers an unforgettable horror experience.

Features


  • Multiplayer Co-Op: Band together with a team of up to 4 players.
  • Single Player: Your job will be difficult, and you will be all alone in the darkness.
  • Unique Mechanics: Experience unparalleled immersion with innovative mechanics like whistle detection and blink detection. Your real-world actions can affect your in-game survival.
  • Proximity Voice: Communicate with your team mates via proximity voice chat, crafting your strategies real-time.
  • Regular Updates: Stay tuned for the new episodes, each with its own distinct theme and setting.

Episodes


The first episode of Unease plunges you into the eerie silence of an abandoned trench during World War II. Your task is to gather intelligence reports and fight off undetermined dangers. Future episodes, to be released regularly in updates, promise equally challenging scenarios and unique themes that draw you deeper into this horror-filled saga. Stay tuned on Steam for a thrilling and unsettling adventure unfolding with every episode!

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
